text: ittae abeulaham-i gang-guhagil juyeo jug-eun jaleul eotteohge sosaengsiki naikka ie galodoe nega midji moshagessdan mal-inyo anibnida geuleona je ma-eum-i pyeong-anhagi wihaeseoibnidaie galodoe ne maliui saeleul jab-ageudeul-eul gildeul-yeo gag eondeog-wie dugo seo geudeul-eul dasi bulleobola geu saedeul-i seodulleo neoegelo olila geuli hayeo gwonneung-gwa jihyega hananimkke iss eum-eul alge doelila
